entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
